dashboard.unregisteredServerHeading: %{number} License Keys Not Registered With Connect

iframe.heading: Manage Server
iframe.closeIFrameNote: Are you sure you wish to close this page? All unsaved progress will be lost.

keys.mainSubheading: Use this page to download license keys for your active and inactive servers. These can be used to transfer Unraid to a new flash drive and view all copies of Unraid registered to your email.
keys.signedInKeysHeading: @:commonServerDetails.status.signedIn Keys (Servers are currently signed in to Connect)
keys.signedOutKeysHeading: @:commonServerDetails.status.signedOut Keys (Possibly available for use on other servers).

headerOptions.title: Configure Header for %{name}
headerOptions.description: Set the header image in your servers Web GUI at [Settings â†’ Display Settings â†’ Show banner (set to Yes) â†’ Custom banner (upload your image)].
headerOptions.myUnraidDescription: To use a custom image for your server, the server must be accessible through a myunraid.net domain.
headerOptions.headerUrlLinkDescription: Click the link below to try to navigate to the display settings page using the last available server URL
headerOptions.headerCachedContainerDescription: Header images are cached once loaded and will not be refreshed until you click the button below.
headerOptions.refreshFailureBody: Could not fetch a header image for this server, are you sure it has one set and is online

description.default: Once generated the download link will expire in 60 seconds.
description.loading: Generating flash backupâ€¦ | Wow you made it go fasterâ€¦ðŸš… | Click again for hyperspeedâ€¦
description.success:
Your download zip should have automatically downloaded. But you can download again if needed.
Download link expires at {downloadExpireTime}.
Once expired just click the button again to Generate a new download link.

managementCard.title: @:pages.iframe.heading
managementCard.accessibleUrlsHelp: These URLs are currently accessible from your location. This means they are using a myunraid.net cerificate, and are running the latest Unraid Connect plugin.
managementCard.inaccessibleUrlsHelp: These URLs are currently inaccessible from your location. This means they may be offline, not using a myunraid.net certificate, or are inaccessible from your current location. These URLs may still allow access to the server, however.

dynamicRemoteAccessCard.title: Dynamic Remote Access (alpha)
dynamicRemoteAccessCard.disableRemoteAccessNote: Unraid will disallow remote access as soon as this action completes.
dynamicRemoteAccessCard.mayNotDisableImmediatelyTooltip: When using UPNP Remote Access, it may take a few minutes for your router to remove the lease.
dynamicRemoteAccessCard.isNotNecessary: Dynamic Remote Access is not required for this server to be managed from your current location.
